scripts.docker:start: docker build . -t ihost-hubble-cloudlink --platform linux/arm/v7 && docker run -it --rm -p 9009:9009 --env IHOST_URL=http://10.0.1.38 --platform linux/arm/v7 ihost-hubble-cloudlink
scripts.docker:publish: docker build . -t ihost-hubble-cloudlink --platform linux/arm/v7 && docker tag ihost-hubble-cloudlink jjv360/ihost-hubble-cloudlink && docker push jjv360/ihost-hubble-cloudlink
